overview: Raphael has been coding professionally since he was 13. Passionate about web, mobile and big-data, he was nominated the top Young Scientist in Israel and was awarded the second place at the Intel World Science contest. Raphael then established and managed “super hacker” teams as an officer in Israel’s elite military intelligence unit. While there, Raphael designed and built massively scalable and secure intelligent data systems that have become standards and earned him the unit’s highest honor as well as the President’s Award for outstanding achievements. Today, Raphael is disrupting finance security by harnessing the collective intelligence of crowds.
